note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Massive Photon
body:
You've got an idea. You need expertise to get from idea to reality. Massive
Photon takes ideas and makes them reality. We specialize in the new, the
innovative, and the satisfyingly difficult. We take your big idea and work with
you to design the best approach to construct it, test it, and launch it.

**Massive Photon** is a group of software and graphic design consultants. We
specialize in web and mobile applications that you can't get off-the-shelf. We
use Agile methodologies to get your product from idea to minimum viable product
to successful application.
